item.title: About
item.description: Hello, my name is Li-Pang Huang. I am from Taiwan. I am a Research Assistant to Prof. Ling-Jyh Chen at Institute of Information Science, Academia Sinica. I am currently working on Data Visualization, Backend Distributed Systems, and AirBox Deployment in AirBox Project. You can check the PM2.5 quality in Taiwan on IDW Map and use PM2.5 open data on PM2.5 Open Data Portal. Curriculum Vitae

item.title: Presentations
item.description: Conference Presentation A Vector Mosquitoes Classification System Based on Edge Computing and Deep Learning Conference on Technologies and Applications of Artificial Intelligence @ Asia University, Taiwan, Nov. 30 2018 Deployment Forums Micro TVOC Sensors Deployment Workshop National Kaohsiung University of Science and Technology, Taiwan, Dec. 9 2018 National Kaohsiung University of Science and Technology, Taiwan, Nov. 25 2018 Actions against PM2.5 via Monitoring and Forecasting
